postCreateCommand.create-venvs: uv venv --clear .venv-cpython --python 3.12 && uv venv --clear .venv-pypy --python pypy@3.10 && uv pip install -r requirements.txt --python .venv-cpython/bin/python && echo 'source .venv-cpython/bin/activate' >> ~/.zshrc
postCreateCommand.install-nerd-font: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y fontconfig curl xz-utils && sudo mkdir -p /usr/local/share/fonts/jetbrainsmono && cd /tmp && curl -OL https://github.com/ryanoasis/nerd-fonts/releases/latest/download/JetBrainsMono.tar.xz && tar -xf JetBrainsMono.tar.xz && rm JetBrainsMono.tar.xz && sudo mv *.ttf /usr/local/share/fonts/jetbrainsmono/ && sudo fc-cache -fv
postCreateCommand.setup-shell: echo 'eval "$(starship init zsh)"' >> ~/.zshrc && mkdir -p ~/.config && starship preset catppuccin-powerline -o ~/.config/starship.toml
